summary: This time, while building a hideaway in their new home of the Great Valley, Littlefoot and the gang rescue a mysterious egg from two scheming egg-nappers and make a starling surprise - and new friend - when the egg hatches.
cast: Scott McAfee|Candace Hutson|Heather Hogan|Jeff Bennett|Rob Paulsen|Linda Gary|Kenneth Mars|John Ingle|Tress MacNeille
title: En busca del valle encantado 2: Aventuras en el gran valle
